scripts.migrate: set NODE_OPTIONS=-r ts-node/register && npx knex --knexfile src/db/knexfile.ts migrate:latest
scripts.rollback: set NODE_OPTIONS=-r ts-node/register && knex --knexfile src/db/knexfile.ts migrate:rollback
scripts.seed: set NODE_OPTIONS=-r ts-node/register && knex --knexfile src/database/knexfile.ts seed:run
scripts.make:migration: set NODE_OPTIONS=-r ts-node/register && knex --knexfile src/db/knexfile.ts migrate:make
scripts.make:seed: set NODE_OPTIONS=-r ts-node/register && knex --knexfile src/db/knexfile.ts seed:make
